verse: The kingdom of heaven is like what happened one night when ten girls took their oil lamps and went to a wedding to meet the groom.
Five of the girls were foolish and five were wise.
The foolish ones took their lamps, but no extra oil.
The ones who were wise took along extra oil for their lamps.
Then Jesus said, “Those people will be punished forever. But the ones who pleased God will have eternal life.”
